function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Viral transmission in buildings and transportation","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, air quality, and surface hygiene","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, surface disinfection technologies","People":"Building occupants, transportation users","Owner":"Building management, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Environmental contamination in hospitals","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 through contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Enhanced cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"UV disinfection systems, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital patients","Owner":"Hospital administration"},{"Description":"Changes in building activities and layouts due to COVID-19","Impact":"Disruption of normal building functions and activities","Mitigation":"Adapting building layouts and implementing safety measures","Technologies":"Transparent barriers, HVAC system adjustments, occupancy management systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Building owners, government authorities"}]}
